system.description: A dizzying rainbow of neon colors spews forth from the casterâ€™s eyes and mouth in a 30ft cone. Creatures caught within the cone must make a [[/save resolve]] or fall @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.6sDpAU4V5ND4DCaf]{Unconscious}. On a failed save, there is also a [[/percent 30]] chance the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.journal.JournalEntry.Ej0fIoR2umnEbLfo.JournalEntryPage.LegKo00gEYfyNEJi]{Blind}. Even if the save is successful, the target has a [[/percent 5]] chance of hallucinations. Creatures that do not use vision are immune to color spray.
